himely.name: HIMELY
himely.title: She/Her The Shadow Companion
himely.quote: A mysterious figure who dances in shadows and light. Her presence brings both comfort and intrigue to every moment.

panda.name: PandaCat
panda.title: He/Him My Family
panda.quote: A loyal companion with a heart of gold. His playful spirit and unwavering support make every adventure memorable.

spy.title: He/Him aka THE SPY !
spy.quote: This Guys is and absolute Dumbass, But it's my big bro and i deal with him (Help me he want to put me in his cave #FREEHIMELY).
